Monica was just like you listening to podcasts and wanted a change.  She took a leap of faith and went to amazonsecrets.net and started following the precise steps to build her own residual income to replace the income she was currently making.

With a small baby at home Monica knew that working 60 hours a week would not provide the life she was looking for.  In her own words she explains how this podcast has changed her life and changed everything she though she knew about building a passive, residual income

episodes.title: 13 The Key Phases of Building Your Amazon Business
episodes.summary:
Learn the three phases of growing your Amazon business based on Mike and Matt’s success. The “start-up” phase (Phase 1) – growing your sales and obtaining reviews. The “modification or tweaking” phase (Phase 2) – optimizing your product to spike the Amazon algorithm to generate maximum sales. Finally, the “Cashing Out” phase (Phase 3) – collect profits from your product sales and utilizing those profits to add additional products.
